meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to one kilometer.
meanings.sent1: We walked for many kliks to reach the park.
meanings.sent2: The sign said the next town was five kliks away.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe we have to walk so many kliks just to get ice cream!
meanings.sent4: The kliks stretched out before us like a never-ending path.
meanings.sent5: The kliks on the map seemed longer than they looked.

meanings.definition: A sound made by pressing a button or switch.
meanings.sent1: The kliks of the keyboard filled the quiet room.
meanings.sent2: I heard the kliks of the camera as she took photos.
meanings.sent3: The kliks of the remote control were music to my ears.
meanings.sent4: The kliks echoed in the empty hallway, creating an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The kliks of the typewriter were a familiar sound in the office.

meanings.definition: A slang term for kilometers per hour.
meanings.sent1: He was driving at over a hundred kliks on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The speedometer showed he was going at 120 kliks.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe he's going at such high kliks in this traffic!
meanings.sent4: The car zoomed past us at lightning speed, hitting 150 kliks.
meanings.sent5: The race car reached incredible kliks on the straight track.
